type.label: TinyInt
type.note: Integer data: 0 to 255

type.label: SmallInt
type.note: Integer data: -32,768 to 32,767

type.label: Real
type.note: Floating precision number data: -3.402823E+38 to 3.402823E+38

type.label: Float
type.note: Floating precision number data: -4.94E+324 to 4.94E+324

type.label: Decimal
type.note: Fixed precision and scale numeric data: -10^38 +1 to 10^38 -1 (decimal and numeric are synonyms)

type.label: Numeric
type.note: Fixed precision and scale numeric data: -10^38 +1 to 10^38 -1 (decimal and numeric are synonyms)

type.label: Char
type.note: Fixed-length character data with a maximum length of 8,000 characters

type.label: Varchar
type.note: Variable-length data with a maximum of 8,000 characters

type.label: Text
type.note: Variable-length data with a maximum length of 2,147,483,647 characters

type.label: nChar
type.note: Fixed-length Unicode data with a maximum length of 4,000 characters

type.label: nVarchar
type.note: Variable-length Unicode data with a maximum length of 4,000 characters

type.label: nText
type.note: Variable-length Unicode data with a maximum length of 1,073,741,823 characters

type.label: Binary
type.note: Fixed-length binary data with a maximum length of 8,000 bytes

type.label: Varbinary
type.note: Variable-length binary data with a maximum length of 8,000 bytes

type.label: Bit
type.note: Boolean: 1 or 0

type.label: Image
type.note: Variable-length binary data with a maximum length of 2,147,483,647 bytes

type.label: Timestamp
type.note: Locally unique binary number updated as a row gets updated

type.label: SQL Variant
type.note: Stores any datatype except text, ntext, image, timestamp
